mapper.sql: DATA_GUID, NODE_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_TIME, NODE_DATA, NODE_TABLE, RECORD_GUID, PRSTATUS, PRFLAG, PRGROUP, PRTYPE, PROPERTY0, PROPERTY1, PROPERTY2, PROPERTY3, PROPERTY4, PROPERTY5, PROPERTY6, PROPERTY7, PROPERTY8, PROPERTY9, PROPERTY10, PROPERTY11, PROPERTY12, PROPERTY13, PROPERTY14, PRINF, PREXP, ITIME, IPERSON, UTIME, UPERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DTIME, DPERSON
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from hb_data_latest
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT latest.* FROM hb_data_latest latest, hb_node node, (SELECT DISTINCT ORG_ID FROM com_person_org WHERE PERSON_ID = #{iperson,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) person, com_resource resource WHERE latest.NODE_ID = node.NODE_ID AND node.NODE_ID = resource.RESOURCE_TYPE_F AND resource.RESOURCE_TYPE_E = person.ORG_ID AND node.ENTERPRISE_ID = #{prflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY latest.NODE_ID,latest.DATA_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into hb_data_latest (DATA_GUID, NODE_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_TIME, NODE_DATA, NODE_TABLE, RECORD_GUID, PRSTATUS, PRFLAG, PRGROUP, PRTYPE, PROPERTY0, PROPERTY1, PROPERTY2, PROPERTY3, PROPERTY4, PROPERTY5, PROPERTY6, PROPERTY7, PROPERTY8, PROPERTY9, PROPERTY10, PROPERTY11, PROPERTY12, PROPERTY13, PROPERTY14, PRINF, PREXP, ITIME, IPERSON, UTIME, UPERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DTIME, DPERSON) values (#{dataGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nodeData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{property10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{property11,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{property12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{property13,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{property14,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{iperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dperson,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update hb_data_latest
DATA_GUID = #{record.dataGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NODE_ID = #{record.nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DATA_TYPE = #{record.dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TIME = #{record.dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TIME = #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NODE_DATA = #{nodeData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RECORD_GUID = #{recordGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where DATA_GUID = #{dataGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update hb_data_latest set NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TIME = #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NODE_DATA = #{nodeData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_TABLE = #{nodeTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORD_GUID = #{recordGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRSTATUS = #{prstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRFLAG = #{prflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRGROUP = #{prgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRTYPE = #{prtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY0 = #{property0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY1 = #{property1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY2 = #{property2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY3 = #{property3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY4 = #{property4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY5 = #{property5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY6 = #{property6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY7 = #{property7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY8 = #{property8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY9 = #{property9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY10 = #{property10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPERTY11 = #{property11,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPERTY12 = #{property12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPERTY13 = #{property13,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPERTY14 = #{property14,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRINF = #{prinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREXP = #{prexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITIME = #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IPERSON = #{iperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UTIME = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPERSON = #{uperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DTIME = #{dtime,jdbcType=DATE}, DPERSON = #{dperson,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DATA_GUID = #{dataGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE hb_data_latest SET DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TIME = #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NODE_DATA = #{nodeData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTY0 = #{property0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITIME = #{itime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UTIME = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE DATA_GUID =(SELECT a.DATA_GUID FROM (SELECT MIN(DATA_GUID) AS DATA_GUID FROM hb_data_latest WHERE NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DATA_TIME = (SELECT MIN(DATA_TIME) FROM hb_data_latest WHERE NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})) a)
